required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Administration of Fostamatinib on Blood Concentrations of Rifampicin in Healthy Subjects.
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label, Non-Randomized, 2-Period, Single Center Study to Assess the Single Dose Pharmacokinetics of R406 in Healthy Subjects When Fostamatinib 150 mg is Administered Alone and in Combination With Rifampicin

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the drug interaction between fostamatinib and rifampicin by comparing the safety, tolerability and plasma concentration of fostamatinib when administered alone and with rifampicin in healthy subjects

primary_outcome.measure: To assess the pharmacokinetics of R406 in healthy subjects when a single dose of fostamatinib is administered alone and in combination with rifampicin. AUC and Cmax will be measured
primary_outcome.time_frame: Period 1: Day 1 to 96 hours post-dose Period 2: Day 6 to 96 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: To assess the pharmacokinetics of R406 in healthy subjects when a single dose of fostamatinib is administered alone and in combination with rifampicin. AUC (0-t), terminal half life, and tmax will be measured
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Period 1: Day 1 to 96 hours post-dose Period 2: Day 6 to 96 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: To examine the safety and tolerability of fostamatinib in combination with rifampicin.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From screening, Day 1 - Day 25, up to follow up visit
secondary_outcome.description: Assessments include: Adverse events, laboratory assessments, vital signs, physical examination and 12-lead electrocardiogram. Absolute values and change in baseline for any of these parameters will be reported.

intervention.description: oral tablets, 150mg (3 X 50mg) single dose per period
oral tablets, 600mg (2 X 300mg) 8 doses over 8 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Provision of informed consent prior to any study specific procedures
- Males or females aged 18 to 55 years (inclusive)
- Minimum weight of 50 kg and a body mass index (BMI) of 18 to 35 kg/m2 (inclusive)
- Female subjects must have a negative pregnancy test at screening and admission of each treatment period, must not be lactating, and must be of non-childbearing potential
Exclusion Criteria:
- History or presence of gastrointestinal, hepatic or renal disease (except for cholecystectomy)
- Any clinically significant illness, medical or surgical procedure, or trauma within 4 weeks before Period 1 Day 1
- Subjects who smoke more than 5 cigarettes or the equivalent in tobacco per day
- Absolute neutrophil count of less than 2500/mm3 or 2.5 x 109/L
- Any previous treatment with fostamatinib
